name: i'm too sad to tell you 2
name_original: i'm too sad to tell you 2
description:
hello again. this is very important:

this game, if you choose to participate, will send me your answer anonymously, you'll know what that means when you play.

so if that makes you uncomfortable, please, please, do not participate, i don't wish to violate the trust you have in me.

if you have any questions or concerns, please leave a comment or email me @ 02.nickk@gmail.com

all the best,

nickk <3

Update 01172017:

I think I accidentally broke the game a few weeks ago, I'll let you know when I update it and it's good to go, thanks!

update 07242018

well, i finally fixed it. everything should be in order. i missed u <3
